title: Bonus 12: A Very Merkabah Jubilee
itunes:title: Bonus: A Very Merkabah Jubilee
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I talk about the obscure Jewish movement known as Merkabah mysticism, and the influential and popular Book of Jubilees.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I talk about the obscure Jewish movement known as Merkabah mysticism, and the influential and popular Book of Jubilees.
itunes:subtitle: Jubilees: The greatest biblical book not in the Bible.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
